items.sentence: The police detained several suspects for questioning.

I don\'t think Tom knows when Mary will visit Boston.

I don\'t think that Tom can do that without our help.
He knows everything that there is to know about jazz.
He saw at a glance that his daughter had been crying.
His name is Tom and he lives next to the post office.
Everybody does stupid stuff like that in high school.
Everybody falls in love at least once in their lives.
Everybody knew there was something terrible going on.
Everyone is drinking, and nearly everyone is smoking.
French is the only foreign language that I can speak.
